data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Saïda, Algeria. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saïda, Algeria

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 226 believers in Saïda against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.section_summary: On average, 17 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Saïda, Algeria.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 330,600 citizens of the the state of Saïda.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 330,347, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Berber, Kabyle people. 0.2% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Saïda, Algeria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: There are 330,600 people living in the state of Saïda. Only about 226 might be believers.
Lord, teach the young people in the state of Saïda to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.
